title: ADDIE-Based Online Education for Enhancing Newborn Care Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental knowledge of pregnancy and childbirth, general understanding of parenting
context.additional_context: Asynchronous education conducted in a smartphone-based limited technology environment. Provides flexible learning schedules considering working parents.

learning_goals: Learners can perform essential newborn care skills (bathing, feeding, safety management, etc.) with 80% or higher accuracy.
Learners can identify neonatal danger signs (respiratory distress, jaundice, etc.) with 90% accuracy and explain response procedures.
Learners can propose three or more solutions to common breastfeeding challenges (breast pain, insufficient milk supply, etc.).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
